newsitem.title: USA: Synopsys to merge with EPIC Design.
newsitem.headline: Synopsys to merge with EPIC Design.

text.p: Synopsys Inc Thursday said it signed a definitive agreement to merge with EPIC Design Technology Inc in a stock deal valued at around $475 million.
Under the definitive agreement, Synopsys would issue 0.7485 of a share of its common stock for each outstanding share of EPIC. EPIC has about 14.7 million shares outstanding.
The merger is intended to be accounted for as a pooling of interests transaction.
Synopsys develops, markets and supports high-level design automation models and software for designers of integrated circuits and electronics systems.
EPIC Design provides focused solutions for designers of deep submicron and nanometer integrated circuits.
